verses.verse: Let us<WG5399> fear<WG5399> therefore,<WG3767> lest<WG3379> perhaps anyone<WG5100> of<WG1537> you<WG5216> should seem<WG1380> to have come short<WG5302> of a promise<WG1860> <WG2641> of entering<WG1525> into<WG1519> his<WG846> rest.<WG2663>

For<WG1063> indeed<WG2532> we have had<WG2070> good news preached<WG2097> to us,<WG2509> even as they<WG2548> also did,<WG235> but the word<WG3056> they heard<WG189> <WG5623> didn't<WG3756> profit<WG5623> them,<WG1565> because it wasn't<WG3361> mixed<WG4786> with faith<WG4102> by those who heard.<WG191>

For<WG1063> we<WG1525> who have believed<WG4100> do enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> that rest,<WG2663> even as<WG2531> he has said,<WG2046> "As<WG5613> I swore<WG3660> in<WG1722> my<WG3450> wrath,<WG3709> <WG1487> they will not enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> my<WG3450> rest;<WG2663>" although<WG2543> the works<WG2041> were finished<WG1096> from<WG575> the foundation<WG2602> of the world.<WG2889>

For<WG1063> he has said<WG2046> this somewhere<WG4225> about<WG3779> the<WG4012> seventh<WG1442> day,<WG2532> "God<WG2316> rested<WG2664> on<WG1722> the<WG2250> seventh<WG1442> day<WG2250> from<WG575> all<WG3956> his<WG846> works;<WG2041>"
and<WG2532> in<WG1722> this<WG5129> place again,<WG3825> <WG1487> "They will not enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> my<WG3450> rest.<WG2663>"

Seeing<WG1893> therefore<WG3767> it remains<WG620> that some<WG5100> should enter<WG1525> therein,<WG846> <WG1519> and<WG2532> they to whom the good news was<WG2097> before<WG4386> preached<WG2097> failed<WG3756> to enter<WG1525> in<WG1525> because of<WG1223> disobedience,<WG543>

he again<WG3825> defines<WG3724> a certain<WG5100> day,<WG2250> today,<WG4594> saying<WG3004> through<WG1722> David<WG1138> so long<WG5118> a time<WG5550> afterward<WG3326> (just as<WG2531> has been said<WG2046>), "Today<WG4594> if<WG1437> you will hear<WG191> his<WG846> voice,<WG5456> don't<WG3361> harden<WG4645> your<WG5216> hearts.<WG2588>"

For<WG1063> if<WG1487> Joshua<WG2424> had given<WG2664> them<WG846> rest,<WG2664> <WG302> he<WG2980> would not<WG3756> have spoken<WG2980><WG99999> afterward<WG3326> of<WG4012> another<WG243> day.<WG2250>
There remains<WG620> therefore<WG686> a Sabbath rest<WG4520> for the people<WG2992> of God.<WG2316>

For<WG1063> he<WG846> who has entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> his<WG846> rest<WG2663> has himself<WG846> also<WG2532> rested<WG2664> from<WG575> his works,<WG2041> as<WG5618> God<WG2316> did from<WG575> his.<WG846>

Let us therefore<WG3767> give diligence<WG4704> to enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> that<WG1565> rest,<WG2443> lest<WG3361> anyone<WG5100> fall<WG4098> after<WG1722> the same<WG846> example<WG5262> of disobedience.<WG543>

For<WG1063> the word<WG3056> of God<WG2316> is living,<WG2198> and<WG2532> active,<WG1756> and<WG2532> sharper<WG5114> than<WG5228> any<WG3956> two-edged<WG1366> sword,<WG3162> and piercing<WG1338> even<WG2532> to<WG891> the dividing<WG3311> of<WG5037> soul<WG5590> and<WG2532> spirit,<WG4151> of both<WG5037> joints<WG719> and<WG5037> marrow,<WG3452> and<WG2532> is able to discern<WG2924> the thoughts<WG1761> and<WG2532> intentions<WG1771> of the heart.<WG2588>

There<WG2076> is no<WG3756> creature<WG2937> that is hidden<WG852> from<WG1799> his<WG846> sight,<WG1799> but<WG1161> all things<WG3956> are naked<WG1131> and<WG2532> laid open<WG5136> before the eyes<WG3788> of him<WG846> with<WG4314> whom<WG3739> we have<WG2254> to do.<WG3056>

Having<WG2192> then<WG3767> a great<WG3173> high priest,<WG749> who has passed through<WG1330> the heavens,<WG3772> Jesus,<WG2424> the Son<WG5207> of God,<WG2316> let us hold tightly<WG2902> to our confession.<WG3671>

For<WG1063> we don't<WG3756> have<WG2192> a high priest<WG749> who<WG1410> can't<WG3361> be touched with the feeling<WG4834> of our<WG2257> infirmities,<WG769> but<WG1161> one who has been<WG3985> in<WG2596> all points<WG3956> tempted<WG3985> <WG3987> like<WG2596> we<WG3665> are,<WG5565> yet without sin.<WG266>

Let us<WG4334> therefore<WG3767> draw<WG4334> near<WG3326> with boldness<WG3954> to the throne<WG2362> of grace,<WG5485> that<WG2443> we may receive<WG2983> mercy,<WG1656> and<WG2532> may find<WG2147> grace<WG5485> for help<WG996> in time of<WG1519> need.<WG2121>
